update.releaseNotes:
Changelogs-
-Added 1.19.30 download support. -Fixed the downloading again issue when you click the download progress button. -Fixed bugs. -Changed colorAccent to blue. -Fixed dark mode.
Problems in this version-
-Autoupdate installation won't work if the signature is different in next version(You need to install manually by going to Android/data/com.farizmcpe.mcdownloader/app.apk
-You can't install this without uninstalling previous version (1.7). You can update if you have the version after 1.7.
-You can't update to next version (2.1) without uninstalling this version if the signature is different in the next version.
